mission.title: Mission Statement
mission.p1: Augmented is on a mission to revolutionise air traffic safety for new drones and eVTOL operators in the low airspace through human-centric, AI-driven separation assurance. By leveraging Sparrow, the first but not the least breakthrough solver, we provide highly scalable, cloud-hosted safety net designed to resolve complex conflicts in real-time.
mission.p2: Our goal is to bridge the gap between academic excellence and industrial reality, reducing operator workload and facilitating a safe, transparent transition toward the future of digital aviation.

safetyNet.title: What is a Safety Net ?
safetyNet.p1: Aviation is the safest mode of transportation. As we introduce new operations in low-level airspace over urban, suburban, and rural areas, we must not only comply with this standard but improve it.
safetyNet.p2: Safety nets play a major role after departure in preventing imminent or actual hazardous situations. They are a critical link in the global safety chain. In current Air Traffic Management, systems like the Short-Term Conflict Alert support controllers by warning of potential conflicts.
safetyNet.p3: Augmented takes this further. We are developing a tool that does not just alert, but actively proposes solutions up to 2 minutes before hazards. Designed for increasingly complex environments, it features a real-time interface with trajectory preview to ensure total situational awareness.

conflictDetection.title: Conflict Detection
conflictDetection.desc: Continuous monitoring of trajectories to identify potential separation losses up to 2 minutes before a potential hazard. Data are filtered and compared with previous states to minimise false alerts and maximise both conflict detection accuracy.

process.title: Process
process.desc: Sparrow computes conflict states in milliseconds, handling multiple global or localised encounters simultaneously. It aggregates data over a 25-second window to maintain detection and decision-making capabilities, even during traffic communication losses or brief service interruptions.

decisionMaking.title: Decision Making
decisionMaking.desc: Sparrow proposes a solution with visual support, a deconfliction preview, and humanly-sound instructions.

instruction.title: Instruction
instruction.desc: Sparrow accounts for manoeuvre latency due to human cognition, decision-making, and instruction execution using an operational time window and a predictive trajectory cone. At any time, the user may resend a request and repeat the previous step.

manoeuvre.title: Manoeuvre
manoeuvre.desc: The user interface shows real-time deconfliction and the status of the conflict, in addition to monitoring any deviation from the decision.

whyAugmented.subtitle: Choose the best available solution for tactical conflict resolution in the extended airspace.

expertise.title: Deep Expertise in AI/ML & Aviation Safety
expertise.p: Augmented is the maturation of four years of intensive innovation in AI/ML-based tactical conflict resolution for the next generation of air traffic management. Our work is rooted in scientific integrity, with core algorithms validated through peer-reviewed research and presented in top-tier journals, magazines, and leading global aviation conferences.

integration.title: Proven Operational Impact & Integration
integration.p: Beyond academic contributions, we pioneer and proof-test our algorithms within major European and UK research projects. Our expertise extends across diverse advanced air traffic environments, focusing on the harmonisation and integration of digital solutions with existing legacy systems to ensure a safe transition for the industry.

performance.title: Disruptive Performance
performance.p: Augmented's solutions deliver unmatched performance by resolving simultaneous, multi-threat global and local conflicts in split seconds. While optimised for low-altitude operations, they masterfully navigate the diverse dynamics of General and Commercial Aviation, generating instructions that minimise manoeuvres. Built for extreme resilience, our platform excels in degraded data environments and maintains integrity even during connection losses of up to 30 seconds, also providing operators with real-time visual validation to ensure decisions are always up to date.

validation.title: Rigorous Design & Validation
validation.p: Augmented ensures separation assurance with a lookahead horizon of up to 2 minutes before potential hazardous proximity. Our AI/ML models are trained in rigorously validated environments and evaluated using performance metrics inspired by global standards (RTCA, ASTM, EUROCAE). We also harmonise our platform with future airborne solutions to avoid redundant or contradictory advisories. Beyond raw performance, we prioritise AI explainability to ensure transparency, while remaining vigilant and adaptive to the evolving regulatory landscape.

simplicity.title: Simplicity & Elegance behind Sophistication
simplicity.p: Augmented's interface is more than just intuitively designed; it is a testament to our belief that beauty and functionality are inseparable in safety-critical systems. We transform complex, high-density operations into beautifully streamlined tasks through a human-centric approach. By prioritising clarity and aesthetic precision, our platform reduces operator workload and mitigates cognitive stress, ensuring that the profound capabilities of our AI/ML are not only powerful but a joy to use; a real partner.

openAccess.title: Open Access & Community Innovation
openAccess.p: We are committed to democratising airspace safety. At this stage, we offer free access to a ready-to-use version of our Sparrow solver because we want to show the world the power of our technology. Most importantly, we are listening. This phase is about transparency and collaboration; it allows innovators and researchers to experience our disruptive solution firsthand while providing the feedback we need to evolve.

pricing.title: Unmatched Pricing
pricing.p: For those looking to integrate our technology into commercial operations or complex industrial systems, Augmented stands at the intersection of operational agility and cost-efficiency. By maintaining a lean and reasonable, expert-driven team at this stage of the extended low-altitude airspace maturation, we foster direct communication and rapid innovation while eliminating the heavy overhead of legacy incumbents. This "human-sized" approach allows us to offer state-of-the-art solutions at unrivaled pricing, making elite safety technology accessible to everyone without compromising on precision or support.

partnership.title: Global Partnership for the Future
partnership.p: Augmented is more than a technology provider; we are your strategic partner in the future of air traffic management. Our mission is to elevate urban air mobility to new heights of safety, efficiency, and accessibility. We believe that airspace safety is a universal challenge; therefore, we embrace worldwide collaboration regardless of borders or nationality. Whether you are seeking a specific solution, interested in a research partnership, or want to contribute to our global mission, don't hesitate to reach out.

sparrow.intro: Sparrow is our first prototype and initial service offering. It demonstrates breakthrough innovation using AI and forward-thinking design. Despite being an MVP, it showcases high-quality UI, rigor, and agility, proving that deep expertise allows even a small entity to deliver a ready-to-use system.
sparrow.spec1: AI Safety Net: Cloud-based tactical conflict resolution to prevent NMAC during cruise phase (Mixed UTM/ATM).
sparrow.spec2: Full Loop Support: Handles conflict detection and resolution internally, or operates "headless" with external detection.
sparrow.spec3: Research Ready: Ideal for U3 service trials, SESAR-type projects, and industry experimentation.
sparrow.spec4: Human-Centric Advisory: Reduces cognitive stress and workload by providing clear, predictable resolutions.
sparrow.spec5: Resilient Design: Works with heterogeneous data and ensures service up to 25s after disconnection.
sparrow.not1: Not a Human Replacement: Does not replace pilots, ATCOs, or assume operational decision-making.
sparrow.not2: No Terminal Operations: Does not address takeoff, approach, landing, or vertiport operations.
sparrow.not3: Not Certified (Yet): When used with external detection, performance depends on input data quality.
sparrow.not4: Not a U-Space Provider: Does not deliver regulated U-space services or assume legal responsibility for separation.
